data.persona: I am but a peasant.  The king looks down on us.  I barely eat.  I wish I had a job.
data.description:
You are in the Public execution stand.
The bazaar holds an execution stand, surrounded by rabid dogs and peasants walking around begging for food from royals.
There's an execution stand, a dog, and a food here.
The hangman and the rat are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a rag.

data.short_motivation: I want to get some food from the execution stand to satisfy my hunger.
data.mid_motivation: I will then have the strength to go apply for a job in the fields.
data.long_motivation: I will work hard so I have steady employment and enough food to eat.
